meanings.definition: Lack of good taste or refinement
meanings.sent1: The tastelessnesses of the outfit made it stand out in a bad way.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's food was bland, showing a clear tastelessnesses in their cooking.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, his tastelessnesses in fashion always made his friends chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The tastelessnesses of the joke left everyone in the room silent.
meanings.sent5: The tastelessnesses of the painting was so extreme that it became a topic of discussion among art critics.

meanings.definition: The quality of being tasteless or lacking in flavor
meanings.sent1: The tastelessnesses of the dish was evident from the first bite.
meanings.sent2: The tastelessnesses of the water made it hard to distinguish from tap water.
meanings.sent3: The tastelessnesses of the ice cream was so extreme that even the kids refused to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The tastelessnesses of the speech left the audience feeling unimpressed.
meanings.sent5: The tastelessnesses of the tea was so strong that even sugar couldn't mask it.
